title: Bladrick's Armory
content:
Bladrick's Armory is a location in Crenopolis. The shop owner, Bladrick, pays the same price for weapons and armor as the Quartermaster from the Quartermaster Shop in Hopeport.

In the Trade interface for Bladrick's Armory, in addition to buying and selling equipment, you can also buyback equipment that you have previously sold to either Bladrick or Quartermaster.
